Package org.drools.brms.server.builder

This package contains utilities for building and validating rule assets in the BRMS.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BRMSPackageBuilder.DSLErrorEvent This is used when loading Jars, DSLs etc to report errors.
 

Class Summary
BRMSPackageBuilder This decorates the drools-compiler PackageBuilder with some functionality needed for the BRMS.
ContentAssemblyError This class is used to accumulate error reports for asset.
ContentPackageAssembler This assembles packages in the BRMS into binary package objects, and deals with errors etc.
 

Package org.drools.brms.server.builder Description

This package contains utilities for building and validating rule assets in the BRMS.
